TopicTitle: Is it possible to extract the kerbonaut model, and how?

Articles.Content:
I want to extract the kerbonaut model and export it to a Blender-readable format so I can make a G-Mod addon (if I'm allowed to do that, of course).

So, is it possible to do that, and if so, how?
You have access to all the model data in game through a plugin so you could write a model file from that, there's no simple extract button though.
